summary: The double life of Methodist minister's wife catches up to her, as her husband campaigns for Mayor in a small New Jersey town.
cast: Tatum O'Neal|Steven Bauer|Peter Greene|Madinah Jabbaar|Julianne Michelle|Robyn Peterson|Scott William Winters|Matthew Meis|Toni Romano|Matt Sauerhoff|Jimmie Walker|Ellen Evans|Veronica Dang|Frank Amoruso|Stephen Badalamenti|Damian Bailey|Victoria Beltran|Clark Carmichael|Matthew Conlon|Allie Dunbar|Julia Giolzetti|Brent Goble|Lenore Harris|Melody Idakaar|T. Jota|Charles Laramy|Anthony Mangano|Armen Mazlumian|Peter O'Connor|John Palumbo|Patricia Parker|Kasia Pilewicz|Angela Relucio|Lynze Schiller|Micah Spayer|Chandra Thomas|Ben Van Bergen|Dennis L.A. White|Matthew Dean Wood|Kathy Patterson
director: Director: Chris Frieri (as Christopher C. Frieri)
title: Sweet Lorraine
